name: Future Criminal
description:
In the distant future, a police force has been assembled to arrest criminals before they can even think of committing their crimes.  Their current target is a man who is destined to one day use a time bomb to destroy the future.  You play as that man.  As time travel has made their forces relentless, the only way to get them off your tail is to commit the crime, therefore focusing all of their forces on your past self.

Someday you must destroy the future.  Don't get arrested.

This game was made for Rev Jam 2, which had the randomly-generated theme of "Someday you must destroy the future.  Don't get arrested."
